alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Prairie (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 11 at 5:09PM CDT until June 11 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN PRAIRIE...MONROE AND NORTHEASTERN ARKANSAS COUNTIES... At 509 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Roe, or near Clarendon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Clarendon... Holly Grove... St. Charles... Ulm... Roe... Palmer... Blackton... Aberdeen... Monroe... Casscoe... Crocketts Bluff... Ragtown... Indian Bay... Pine City... Lawrenceville... Duncan... Cross Roads in Monroe County... Louisiana Purchase State Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
